title: please help keep getting pop up that closes my game out
body: i keep getting some league of legends pop up that closes out my games while im playing it flashes so fast i cant even see what it really is all it reads is league of legends.

replies.body: If League crashes when that pop-up happens, there's a good chance that pop-up is telling you something along the lines that League had a critical error. Most of the time with cases like this, it can be fixed pretty quickly by running a repair through the client options.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qLWEj5tE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-05-28T01:16:51.903+0000)
>
> If League crashes when that pop-up happens, there's a good chance that pop-up is telling you something along the lines that League had a critical error. Most of the time with cases like this, it can be fixed pretty quickly by running a repair through the client options.

I have already done this and it's still happening.   So repairing isn't the solution, at least in my case

In that case it might actually be something within your pc itself. Let's go ahead and get you some more in-depth one on one help with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Use this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to generate some logs and shoot those over to the tech guys and they'll be able to see just what the main issue is!

> In that case it might actually be something within your pc itself. Use this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to generate some logs and shoot those over to the tech guys and they'll be able to see just what the main issue is!

I'm confident it's not my computer, considering it's only about 6 months old since I bought it new and I've had zero issues with League in-game this entire time until this started happening about 2 or 3 days ago.

In any case however I have downloaded the Hextech Repair Tool you provided the link for and got the logs.  I will submit a support ticket accordingly.  I hope it's not a complicated thing to resolve. I'm not even upset at Riot or the game in general over this.  All I want is hopefully to find a solution to the problem.  

Thank you for responding though.
It seems a number of people are having a very similar problem right now, myself included.
same things happening to me really need a solution
